statements: SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, platform_id FROM student_interactions WHERE platform_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(platform_id) FROM student_interactions GROUP BY platform_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM student_interactions WHERE platform_id = 2;
SELECT student_id, platform_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM student_interactions WHERE platform_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'login' ORDER BY student_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM student_interactions GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT platform_id FROM student_interactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT AVG(platform_id) AS avg_platform_id, MAX(student_id) AS max_student_id FROM student_interactions;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, email, age FROM students WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM student_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT student_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM student_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'exam';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM student_interactions GROUP BY student_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;

SELECT s.name, si.interaction_type, si.interaction_time FROM students s INNER JOIN student_interactions si ON s.student_id = si.student_id WHERE si.interaction_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY si.interaction_time DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_date FROM Interactions WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, email, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Interactions ON Students.student_id = Interactions.student_id;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE start_date <= '2022-03-15';
SELECT student_name, course_name, interaction_type FROM Students JOIN Interactions ON Students.student_id = Interactions.student_id WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT student_name, course_name, interaction_date FROM Students JOIN Interactions ON Students.student_id = Interactions.student_id WHERE course_id = 3 AND completed = true;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor FROM Courses WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, registered_date FROM students WHERE registered_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, interaction_date FROM students s JOIN interactions i ON s.student_id = i.student_id JOIN courses c ON i.course_id = c.course_id WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-08-31';

SELECT course_name, AVG(average_duration) AS average_duration, AVG(completion_rate) AS completion_rate FROM courses c JOIN analytics a ON c.course_id = a.course_id GROUP BY course_name ORDER BY completion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN interactions ON students.student_id = interactions.student_id
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students, courses WHERE students.student_id = '123456' AND courses.course_id = '789012'
SELECT student_name, course_name, interaction_date, duration FROM students JOIN interactions ON students.student_id = interactions.student_id WHERE interaction_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT course_name, average_duration, completion_rate FROM analytics ORDER BY average_duration DESC, completion_rate ASC

SELECT student_name, course_name, interaction_date, duration FROM students JOIN interactions ON students.student_id = interactions.student_id LEFT JOIN analytics ON interactions.course_id = analytics.course_id
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, email FROM students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollments WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT lesson_name, lesson_description FROM lessons WHERE course_id = 3 AND lesson_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT id, name, email FROM students WHERE id = 1;
SELECT s.name, c.course_name, se.enrollment_date FROM students s JOIN student_enrollments se ON s.id = se.student_id JOIN courses c ON se.course_id = c.course_id;
SELECT l.lesson_name, l.lesson_description, c.course_name FROM lessons l JOIN courses c ON l.course_id = c.course_id WHERE c.course_name = 'Mathematics';

SELECT si.student_id, l.lesson_name, si.interaction_type, si.interaction_date FROM student_interactions si JOIN lessons l ON si.lesson_id = l.lesson_id WHERE si.interaction_type = 'attendance' ORDER BY si.interaction_date DESC;
